scripts.dev: cd client; npm run dev && cd ../server; npm run dev
scripts.setup: cd client; npm i; cd ../server; npm i; cd ../database; npm run setup;
scripts.start: cd client; npm run build; cd ../server; npm run mongo && npm run start
scripts.clean: cd client; rm -rf node_modules; cd ../server; rm -rf node_modules; cd ../database; rm -rf node_modules; rm -rf node_modules
